metadata.title: mediawiki: action=protect lets users with 'protect' permission protect to higher protection level (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: In mediawiki package when using API to protect a page, user with "protect" permission can protect the page to a higher level than they can edit. 
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
